subject: Has anyone tried this piece of equipment for EVPS? Raudive Diode
author: Country
full_text:
Hello everyone....

I was wondering if anyone had tried this piece of equipment to help them get EVP's and what their experience was like (good, bad, neutral)? I have read some about the original creator or discover of this method for EVP's. Anyway, I saw this listed on Ebay:

>>This device re-creates two authentic Raudive Diode circuits in one unit that you can record together using any stereo recording device with a microphone socket. Unique dual circuitry gives you two different receivers in one unit. Connects to a microphone jack on a PC or tape recorder.>>>>

Thanks very much for your help and/or input!
CB
